name: Tea Tray Memory Game
description:
Welcome to the Tea Tray memory Game.

Grab a pencil and paper and get ready to test your memory.

Pick a level - Kids, Families or Expert

A selection of random items will appear on the tray.

1. Allow everyone to view the tray for 30, 60 or 90 seconds.
2. Cover it up and when everyone thinks they have the answers…
3. Click reveal and see who got the most.

Keep playing and see how many you can remember.

Simple and fun for all the family this Christmas.

A game devised on a version played every Christmas by my mum & dad.

Produced by VoiceoverGuy Media Apps
www.voiceoverguy.co.uk
